attributes.action: deem Ed's Decking a world heritage site to be preserved for future generations to enjoy and marvel at, as I have.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"Ed's Decking - wa waaaaaa wa"

The council are trying to move Ed's Decking in a heinous land-grabbing exercise. We, the people, ask that the PM uses his executive powers to prevent this crime.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
